mapper.select: select sum(oMoney) oMoney,extract (MONTH from oDate) as oDate,ostutas from orders group by oDate,ostutas order by oDate,ostutas desc

select (select sum(onum) from orders where ostutas=2) success,(select sum(onum) from orders) allnum, (select sum(oMoney) from orders) omoney,sum(onum) onum,extract (MONTH from oDate) as oDate,oStutas from orders group by oDate,oStutas order by oDate,oStutas desc
